text: Phira jadom pavitara mahine batita ho jana tam, jithe vi dekho bahu- devavadi'am di hati'a kara di'u. Unham nu pharho, gherom ate hareka tham te unham di ghata vica baitho. Phira jekara uha tauba kara laina ate namaza sathapita karana ate zakata dena tam unham nu mu'afa kara di'um. Alaha mu'afa karana vala ate rahimata karana vala hai
